sect1.title: Limitations of this document
sect1.para: The whole team of developers of PMB hope this document will have brought you the essentials. If that is not the case, there exist other sources of information at your disposal.

para.citetitle: The users' mailing list of PMB

sect1.para: to subscribe : send an email, subject SUBSCRIBE to pmb.user_request@sigb.net

para.citetitle: The mailing list for translators, developers, for Unicode support (non European alphabets)

sect1.para: to subscribe : send an email, subject SUBSCRIBE to pmb.trans@sigb.net

sect1.title: Updates
sect1.para: This document is updated regularly. Do not hesitate to visit www.sigb.net to obtain the latest version.

sect1.title: Join us
sect1.para: PMB would not exist without your participation. You can help us develop PMB at various levels :

listitem.para: translations and locations (editing XML files using an opensource application or a simple text editor like Windows Notepad)
signalling out bugs (bugs are quickly handled and corrected)
testing and evaluating pre-release versions (available on the Web site from a few days to some two weeks prior to the release of the final version)
messages of support, don't forget to tell us about your library, its collection, your occupation, etc.
development of additional tools (graphical user interfaces for the z39.50 server for example)
